abstracts.cdata!:
The development objective of the Private
            Housing Finance Markets Strengthening Project is to
            strengthening the financial capacity of SHF to stabilize
            mortgage markets in the short term and to expand mortgage
            access to lower income groups over the medium term; and
            improving SHF's technical capacity to expand access to
            mortgages over the medium-term. The extension will allow SHF
            to finalize the implementation of the planned reforms to
            increase access to low income segments; which remains a key
            challenge towards achieving sustainable development in the
            sector. This will be the first extension of the
            project's closing date, for a total of nine months.
